entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
